definitions: An expression of agreement or understanding, often implying that the speaker has had a similar frustrating or difficult experience.
An exclamation used to show empathy or shared experience, especially regarding something annoying or challenging.
examples: "My commute was terrible today." "Tell me about it! I was stuck in traffic for an hour."
"This new software is so confusing." "Tell me about it, I can't figure out how to use it either."
"I'm so tired of all this rain." "Tell me about it, I haven't seen the sun in days."
